column5: I will be bringing my Dan  Rob
Yeap we are in the Vue, now if I could only remember the details..

Well my friend Kenny was in the T.O area so he dropped by Perfectvue on the way home took some decent pics .  It looks like alot of the docs were taken out of the water due to low water levels one main doc remains.  The launch is mostly sandy however there is another launch down the road that costs $2 you put your $$$ in a little box the honour system. I will see when I get there of course I have relatives and friends with 4 X 4 's  Kenny did not notice any BBQ's so I will phone Joann to find out if not I guess GlennK and I will be brininging the camping BBQ's.  I will also find out how much vacancy is available.  Looking forward to meeting so many new members .MTP
so has anybody else jumped on board with us ???????
You can add Slowpoke to our cabin.
when is it?
Pete,  Nov 13,14 and 15

I will more than likely be down there that Sat., doubt I can come for the weekend.  I will be there this Sat. and next weekend from Friday to Sunday.  Word is there are lots of em in now, its just a case of getting them to bite!
Bump to the top.It wont be long now.
I will probably stop by to say Hi to everyone.  Hope all of you have alot of success fishing that weekend.  Regards, Sam
Looking forward to see you again Sam.We may even stop in on Thursday morning on are way by. Dan
i'll try to stop on by and i hope my boat is ready for it this year
I'm in! W HH & Gerritt! Looking forward to seeing y'all again! Cheers Ted
Be nice to see you again too Ted! I still remember last years pork roast... MMMMMM

TED!!! My Brother from another Mother!!!!! Last year, before the the GTG, Ted connected with me regarding the trip. We had room for one in our cottage, and invited Ted... none of us in our cottage had ever met Ted before! He showed up mid after on the Friday, quick introductions and immediately put a lovely pork roast in the oven, just so we could have something "to nibble on" during our stay! Needless to say we hit it off immediately and after sharing a few pops, we found out that we have many similar life experiences! He's like the brother I didn't know I had! Lookin forward to seeing yah again Ted! Hopefully this year we'll spank those Pickereyes! HH
ted's a great guy... took me and my banana filled tackle bag both days last year.. i'm in his debt..  any way to catch the lesner / couture fight up there?
Hey Ted... bring your ice scraper! Don't wanna see the fillet knife out again.... LMAO !!

Hey everyone, looks like I'm gonna make my first GTG.  Sharing a spot with Lexx and BassMaster Mike. I've packed up the tail dancers and told the boss he won't see me Friday - going to do some shopping today (technically just for groceries but if I happen near bass pro well you never know what you could find).  Looking forward to a fun weekend, haven't been to the area since the opener back in May:  <object width="400" height="300"> <param name="flashvars" value="&offsite=true&intl_lang=en-us&page_show_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2Fshow%2F&page_show_back_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2F&set_id=72157604906614921&jump_to="></param> <param name="movie" value="http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf?v=61927"></param>'>http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf?v=61927"></param> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf?v=61927" allowFullScreen="true" flashvars="&offsite=true&intl_lang=en-us&page_show_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2Fshow%2F&page_show_back_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2F&set_id=72157604906614921&jump_to=" width="400" height="300"></embed></object>     See you guys up there Sean
That was funny! I had forgot about that....frozen fuel line too...this year high octane (no ethanol)!

<object width="400" height="300"> <param name="flashvars" value="&offsite=true&intl_lang=en-us&page_show_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2Fshow%2F&page_show_back_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2F&set_id=72157604906614921&jump_to="></param> <param name="movie" value="http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf?v=61927"></param>'>http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf?v=61927"></param> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.flickr.com/apps/slideshow/show.swf?v=61927" allowFullScreen="true" flashvars="&offsite=true&intl_lang=en-us&page_show_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2Fshow%2F&page_show_back_url=%2Fphotos%2Femosworld%2Fsets%2F72157604906614921%2F&set_id=72157604906614921&jump_to=" width="400" height="300"></embed></object>  Looking forward to meeting you Sean.  Better get some sleep now
Is it worth getting this thread pinned mayby?
I am in, cabin arrangements pending.
I am in with Fishindevil in my boat.And we will be staying at Perfect Vue with Mtp,Glenk,Kenny,and one more.
i am in staying at perfect Vue and i will bring my boat hometown i have room if you want? or they still have a couple of cabins left  Rob
Yup I am with all these boys now who is cookin and who is doing the dishes  Fishin Devil well we will take it easy on ya Bud  I may fetch ya a beer or 2.  Ah its so far away
I'm in with Fishhunter and a few other lads
Well if that's the case I guess Dano and I won't be there that weekend. Lloyd was taking us out for a weekend and I'd asked him about the 15th/16th. Guess that answers that.
Im looking forward to it dan & mike !!! .  ..and thanks for the beer offer mike !!  it will be great to see everyone again..
Irishfield check your pm
I am in with you, check your PM's. What about a "Break Out Another Thousand". Yours or mine...

you guyz will love perfect vue, great cabins, sleeps 4 or 5 if you use the couch, nice docks , launch is alittle tricky if you don,t have a 4x4, sandy beach, i  stay there every year for opener! Joanne is super nice!

Well sad to say I have to abandon Percher and the chance to fish in his new Lady .....damn i was gonna christen it anyway me and Pointed wont be up there this year there is a possibility maybe come up for a day who knows anyway good luck all and play safe Peter
Well its to bad you guys cant make it.It wont be the same.But at least I wont have to power wash my boat out afterwards.
Count looks to be 11 so far. Come on guys get booked and lets get some fishis.
I am in with Headhunter, Bitsmith2k and his buddy. So please add 4 more to the total.  G
What "G" said!!!LOL HH
Glad to see everyones comming to the BOQ !!!!  its gonna be a blast,and a walleye filled couple of days...
Well that makes 15 .Anybody else?There should still be lots of room left at Perfect Vue.
15 plus the 2 outsiders = 17
Dano, Terry and I will be on BOQ that weekend... but we won't be at Perfect Vue
Then we will see you on the water!
Well Wayne we will keep are eyes out for you.But I dont think you will be to hard to miss.Thats got to be the biggest Lund on the bay. Dan
Won't be in my boat Dan... will be in Lloyd Daume's new ride!
bump
Lexxington and i are in!!!  Not sure about the details. Looking forward to seeing you all there, had a blast last year!!!
Just wondering who is bringing there boat.I know i am taking mine and MTP is taking his and I believe kenny is bring his .so thats 3 boats for our cottage. Dan
